articles.title: Vimeo Removes Infowars Content as CNN Continues Blacklist Crusade
articles.description: The video streaming service Vimeo has become the latest company to remove content created Alex Jones’s InfoWars, following an intense blacklist campaign led by CNN and other progressive media.

articles.title: Far Left Attacks Vox for Reporting that Antifa Attacked Journalists
articles.description: HuffPost’s “hate and extremism” reporter Christopher Mathias took to Twitter to attack news outlet Vox for covering Antifa violence against journalists and police officers over the weekend.

articles.title: Kejriwal, Sisodia named accused in Delhi Chief Secretary 'assault' case
articles.description: Chief Secretary Anshu Prakash was allegedly assaulted during a meeting at Mr. Kejriwal’s official residence on February 19.

articles.description: Detectives say Joseph DeAngelo's criminal behavior escalated in Visalia, California, from sadistic burglar to notorious serial killer

articles.description: Airline executives are unclear whether the ground worker who stole a turboprop plane from Seattle-Tacoma International Airport and performed several stunts before crashing had flying experience.

articles.title: Dow drops more than 100 points, posts 4-day losing streak as Turkey crisis continues to rattle investors

articles.author: The Economist
articles.title: “BlacKkKlansman” suffers from Spike Lee’s heavy hand
articles.description: The director has inserted some of his favourite themes into the film. That blunts the force of this strange true story

articles.author: Greg Bensinger
articles.title: Uber Drivers Take Riders the Long Way—at Uber’s Expense
articles.description: Many Uber drivers are taking unnecessarily long routes to drive up fares. But unlike with traditional taxis, it is the ride-hailing companies that are responsible for covering the bigger bill.

articles.author: Sam Schechner
articles.title: France Takes On Cellphone Addiction With a Ban in Schools
articles.description: A French law is set to bar cellphone use by primary and middle school students, an effort to cut down on distractions in class and encourage play or reading during recess.
